stories.text: A family member in Ukraine asked me to delete their Facebook account fearing that posted materials may lead to prosecution. Is there a way I can delete the account permanently, without waiting 30 days or allowing a possibility for recovery?
stories.title: Ask HN: How can I delete a Facebook account without waiting 30 days?
